page.title: 07Homestead Farm Milking
page.content: The{milking parlour}is 7 years old.12 cows come in at a time. The Guernseys come in first. They feed on concentrates in troughs. The person doing the milking stands in the middle and puts the machines on the cows. Sometimes they kick.It takes just over{2 hours}to milk{100 cows. } Your hands and feet get very cold in winter. It takes 2-3 minutes to milk each cow. The first milking is at 6 o'clock and the second at 4 o'clock in the afternoon. The milk is kept cool at 40 degrees.The{tanker}comes every day and the milk is piped into it. The milk is tested for bacteria and antibiotics. There has to be some bacteria in the milk for cheese making.
